because he has done wonderful things!

Yahweh has declared to people that he has defeated his enemies;
he has revealed that he has punished
all the world have seen that he has done it.

in very remote places in all the earth
have seen that our God has defeated
[MTY] everywhere should sing joyfully to Yahweh;

the rivers are clapping their hands
